overview: SVM6 "Drive Thru South Italy" is the new number of videomagazine produced annually by Surfcorner.it.  With this number the videomagazine takes us on a trip through southern Italy, Puglia Calabria, Sicily and Sardinia South South, through some of the best waves ever seen in Italy !!  In addition to this trip to the south of the peninsula, the video begins with a Special Trip Island of Fire: Lanzarote, to help you discover the waves of an island so near as versatile, offering conditions of any kind, for any surfer.
title: SVM6 Drive Thru South Italy
